entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning after midnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming north 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 14.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
